definitions.definition: To restore a friendly relationship ; to bring back or return to harmony .
examples: to wait until others have reconciled

definitions.definition: To make things compatible or consistent .
To make the net difference in credits and debits of a financial account agree with the balance .

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To restore a friendly relationship ; to bring back or return to harmony .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To make things compatible or consistent .
( accounting , transitive ) To make the net difference in credits and debits of a financial account agree with the balance .
